tool_description: Searches scripture databases using keywords, themes, or concepts to find relevant passages across multiple books and translations.

search_terms.description: Keywords or phrases to search for in scripture

search_type.description: Type of search: exact_phrase, any_words, all_words, theme, or concept

scripture_corpus.description: Scripture collection to search: bible, quran, torah, bhagavad_gita, all

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

error_messages: Empty search terms: Provide at least one search term in the search_terms array.
Invalid search type: Use one of [exact_phrase, any_words, all_words, theme, concept].
Invalid scripture corpus: Use one of [bible, quran, torah, bhagavad_gita, all].
Invalid max_results: Must be an integer between 1 and 100.
usage: Provide search_terms array and search_type, optionally specify scripture_corpus and max_results. Returns ranked list of passage references with relevance scores.

total_results.description: Total number of matching passages found

references.description: Array of scripture references in standard format

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and scope
